item.title: Connell Lake Watershed Protection and Recreation Act

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

summary.text:
Connell Lake Watershed Protection and Recreation Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) and the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified federal land and interests (approximately 880 acres of federal land and interests in land in the Connell Lake area) to the Ketchikan Gateway Borough in Alaska.

Requires the conveyed land to be managed in accordance with the terms of the Recreation and Public Purposes Act.

bill.title: Connell Lake Watershed Protection and Recreation Act

item.title: Connell Lake Watershed Protection and Recreation Act

A bill to provide for the application of the Recreation and Public Purposes Act to the Connell Lake area to enable the Ketchikan Gateway Borough in Alaska to obtain land in the area in accordance with that Act.
Connell Lake Watershed Protection and Recreation Act

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
